channel.title: How do i start a 2nd server?
channel.description: ok so i have 1 hamachi server and i want to start another but not like you no...for example : ScapeScape1, ScapeScape2, ScapeScape3 etc. i want it to be different from other one is this possible?

item.title: How do i start a 2nd server?
item.dc:creator: @Screwy Screwy
item.description:
@Screwy wrote:

I guess you get a new server and change the port, and make a No-IP for it, instead of hamachi. But you WILL lag if there’s about 20 people on each, and you try to play on one of them on that same computer. But I don’t know if it will work.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i start a 2nd server?
